Title: Requires the owner of certain sites to establish and maintain an environmental maintenance trust fund
Summary: Requires the owner of sites where any action is or was taken which may have a significant impact on the environment to establish and maintain an environmental maintenance trust fund.
LawCode: Add Art 9 Title 23 §§9-2301 & 9-2303, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to requiring the owner of certain sites to establish and maintain an environmental maintenance trust fund
